Trade/Device Name(s): BD Directigen EZ Flu A+B test
BD DirectigenTM EZ Flu A+B test
Directigen TM EZ Flu A+B test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Directigen EZ Flu A+B test, a chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens in respiratory samples
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay to directly and qualitatively detect influenza A and B viral antigens from respiratory specimens of symptomatic patients as an aid in diagnosing influenza A and B infections, with negative results to be confirmed by cell culture
